dct_title_s: The Times map of British South Africa, the Transvaal and Orange Free State
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale 1:2,500,000. 40 miles = 1 in. Map of South Africa showing British South Africa, South African Republic, Orange Free State, Portuguese and German territory, roads, railways, goldfields, telegraph lines, steamship routes and distances during the Boer War (1899-1902). Prime meridian: Greenwich. Cover title: The Times war map of South Africa. Dimensions: 98 x 72 centimeters
